channel.title: Dessert on John L. Godlee
channel.description: Recent content in Dessert on John L. Godlee

item.title: Chia Seed Chocolate Pudding
item.description: Ingredients 360 ml milk 63 g chia seeds 24 g cocoa powder 2-5 tbsp golden syrup 0.5 tsp ground cinnamon 0.25 tsp salt 0.5 tsp vanilla extract Method Add all ingredients to bowl and mix Refrigerate overnight Can blend until creamy and smooth if desired

item.title: Chocolate brownies
item.description: Ingredients 100 g plain flour 2 tsp baking powder 4 eggs 375 g caster sugar 275 g butter 75 g cocoa powder 100 g chocolate chips Method Preheat oven to 180C Grease and line a 20x25 cm tray with baking parchment Add all ingredients to a large bowl Mix until combined Spoon into tin and spread evenly Bake for 40-45 minutes

item.title: Chocolate peanut butter cups
item.description: Ingredients 300 g dark chocolate 0.5 cups peanut butter 0.25 icing sugar 20 cupcake papers Method Shred the chocolate into a heat resistant bowl Combine the peanut butter and icing sugar into a dough Lay out the cupcake papers on a baking sheet Melt the chocolate in a double boiler Spoon a thin layer of chocolate into each cupcake paper Divide the dough into 20 small discs Place the discs on top of the chocolate in the cupcake papers Spoon the rest of the chocolate so it covers the discs completely Refrigerate the cups for an hour or more until set

item.title: Elderberry Pie
item.description: Ingredients Filling 3.5 cups elderberries 1 cup sugar 0.25 tsp salt 2 tbsp cornstarch or tapioca 1 tbsp lemon juice 1 tbsp butter Pastry 275 g plain flour 110 g butter 80 g sugar 1 egg Milk Method Pastry Crumb together butter and flour Add sugar Mix in egg and enough milk to form soft dough Roll into ball, refrigerate for 30 minutes Roll out and line pie dish, set some aside for lid Filling Mix filling ingredients and simmer to dissolve sugar Pour filling into pie shell Cut vents in lid Bake at 200C for 40-45 minutes Serve warm with cream

item.title: Gajar burfi
item.description: Ingredients 2 tbsp ghee or other clarified butter 550 g carrots 100 g milk powder 70 g caster sugar 1 tsp cardomom powder 20 unsalted pistachios 0.5 tsp ghee Method Melt the ghee in a thick bottomed pan Grate the carrots Mix carrots with ghee On medium heat saute until almost cooked Mix milk powder, saute for 1 minute Add sugar, cardomom, mix Saute for 10 minutes on low to medium heat Line baking tray with parchment and grease When mixture is thickened, transfer to pan, smooth the top Chop pistachios, sprinkle on top Leave to set at room temperature Store in fridge, slice into squares to serve

item.title: Savoury Scones
item.description: Ingredients 360 g white flour 4 tsp baking powder 0.75 tsp salt 1 tbsp sugar 1 tsp dried oregano 0.5 tsp baking soda 0.25 tsp garlic powder 0.25 tsp dried basil 6 tbsp butter (cold grease also works) 1 egg 240 ml milk Optional - Shredded red leicester Method Preheat oven to 200C Combine flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, oregano, bakin soda, garlic powder, basil in a large bowl Crum in the butter Whisk together egg and milk Add egg and milk to dry ingredients, combine Turn onto a lightly floured surface and knead together into a ball.

item.title: Stewed Rhubarb
item.description: Ingredients 750 g rhubarb, chopped into 2 cm pieces Juice and zest of 1 orange 110 g sugar 2 thumbs of ginger, shaved 1 tsp vanilla extract 250 ml yoghurt 1 tbsp golden syrup Method Place rhubarb, orange juice, orange zest, sugar, 2 tbsp water, ginger in a pan Boil then reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes or until rhubarb is soft Mix in vanilla extract, yoghurt, golden syrup Serve warm with yoghurt

item.title: Vegan brownies
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups flour 1 cup water 1 cup brown sugar 1 cup white sugar 1 tsp salt 1 tsp vanilla extract 0.75 cup cocoa powder 0.5 cup vegetable oil 0.5 tsp baking powder 0.5 cup nuts (optional) 0.5 cup chocolate chips (optional) Method Preheat oven to 180C Heat water and 1 cup of flour over low heat in a pan, until gooey Cool completely Mix sugar, salt, vanilla, cocoa powder, vegetable oil, add to flour mixture Mix well Add the remaining 1 cup flour, baking powder, nuts, chocolate chips, mix thoroughly Grease baking pan Bake for 25 minutes or until middle is cooked

item.title: Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup white, oat, or spelt flour 0.5 tsp baking soda 0.25 tsp salt 0.25 cup white sugar 0.25 cup brown sugar or coconut sugar 0.33 cup chocolate chips 3 tbsp oat/soya milk 3 tbsp oil 0.25 tsp vanilla extract Method Combine flour, baking soda, salt, white sugar, brown sugar, chocolate chips in a bowl Stir in milk, oil and vanilla extract to form a cohesive dough, add more milk if needed Refrigerate at least 2 hours Preheat oven to 170C Form dough balls and place on a greased baking tray Bake 11 minutes Cool for at least 10 minutes until hardened up

item.title: Victoria Sponge Cake
item.description: Ingredients 175 g self-raising flour 1 tsp baking powder 3 eggs 175 g sugar 175 g butter 0.5 tsp vanilla extract Method Sieve flour into large mixing bowl Add baking powder, eggs, sugar, butter, vanilla extract Preheat oven to 170C Whisk until smooth Divide into 2 18-20 cm cake tins Bake for 20 minutes Sandwich with whipped cream and jam
